entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
